scripts.cy:watch: npm run prepare:prisma && nodemon --watch cypress --watch cypress.config.cjs --ext js,ts,jsx,tsx,cjs,mjs,json --exec "cypress run --e2e"
scripts.test: start-server-and-test "npm --prefix .. run dev:stack" http://localhost:5173 "npm run cy:run"
scripts.test:docker: sh -c 'docker compose -f ./docker-compose.yml up --build --exit-code-from cypress; code=$?; docker compose -f ./docker-compose.yml down -v; exit $code'
